name: goodserviceioNYCSubwayStatus&ArrivalTimes
0:
”Alexa, ask good service for the next trains at bedford avenue”
”Alexa, ask good service for the status of the A train”
”Alexa, ask good service for currently delayed trains”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: good service
des:
Powered by goodservice.io, this Alexa skill provides real-time statuses of each train line, as well as upcoming train arrival times for any station of the New York City subway system. goodservice.io uses real-time data to determine train delays, gaps in wait times and issues with train speeds for each subway line. Accurate estimates of train departure times at any station are calculated using data from recent trains.

SAMPLE PHRASES
- "Alexa, ask good service for the next trains at 42nd Street Port Authority Bus Terminal"
- "Alexa, ask good service for the next train times" (remembers the most recently asked station)
- "Alexa, ask good service for the status of the F train"
- "Alexa, ask good service for the status of the Rockaway Shuttle"
- "Alexa, ask good service for currently delayed trains"

For more information, check out goodservice.io.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
